sentences.cn: “ 没问题,”巴比康回答, “ 不过这可不是公共的节日. ”

sentences.en: Despite the bad weather the fete will go ahead.
sentences.cn: 尽管天气不好,游乐会照常举行.

sentences.en: Extricate oneself of not to be exposed to, manager fete is entertained.
sentences.cn: 见不得脱身, 经理便设宴招待.

sentences.en: Go to hell! Today is your fete - day!
sentences.cn: 去死吧! 今天是你的忌日!

sentences.en: He was at a fete for a new client.
sentences.cn: 他正在参加为一位新客户举行的盛大招待会.

sentences.en: I gladly accepted their invitation to open the fete.
sentences.cn: 我愉快地接受了他们的邀请,为义卖会主持开幕式.

sentences.en: Just touch Shenyang, master fete is xenial.
sentences.cn: 甫抵沈阳, 主人便设宴款待.

sentences.en: Our village is holding a fete to raise money for the building of the new hall.
sentences.cn: 我们村里准备举行游艺会,以筹募经费建造礼堂.

sentences.en: Seeing that it's raining hard, the fete will probably be cancelled.
sentences.cn: 因为雨下得很大, 游园会很可能被取消.

sentences.en: Sirs, ladies. welcome arrive at the evening party of my fete ~!
sentences.cn: 先生们, 女士们. 欢迎参加我第五代火影的庆功晚会~!

sentences.en: The fete will take place on Sunday, rain or shine.
sentences.cn: 游园义卖会定于星期日举行, 风雨无阻.

sentences.en: The pop star flew 100 friends in from London and Paris for a two-day fete.
sentences.cn: 这名歌星从伦敦和巴黎把100位朋友空运过来参加一个两天的游园会。

sentences.en: The tragedy is developed form the bacchanal doxology as one part of the fete ceremony of Dionysus.
sentences.cn: 悲剧作为狄俄尼索斯祭祀仪式的一部分，是由酒神颂歌发展而来的。

sentences.en: They fete his recovery with ice cream and cake.
sentences.cn: 他们以冰淇淋和蛋糕庆祝他的康复.

sentences.en: This fete of the casting will be a grand ceremony.
sentences.cn: 这个铸炮节应该好好地庆祝一下.

sentences.en: Voluntary helpers, eg at a fete, bazaar, etc.
sentences.cn: 志愿的帮手(如在义卖会 、 义卖场等).

trans.tran_cn: 游乐会，游园会，盛大节日，庆祝，盛宴
trans.tran_en: A fete is a fancy party or celebration
